Clear.Label: clear
Clear.Description: A clear day. No penalties or modifiers.

Fog.Label: fog
Fog.Description: Fog reduces the accuracy of ranged weapons.

Rain.Label: rain
Rain.Description: Rain reduces the accuracy of ranged weapons, extinguishes fire, and slows people down.

DryThunderstorm.Label: dry thunderstorm
DryThunderstorm.Description: Dry thunderstorms are dangerous because the lightning can start fires and there is no rain to put them out.

RainyThunderstorm.Label: rainy thunderstorm
RainyThunderstorm.Description: The lightning will start fires, but the rain will put it out. The rain also reduces movement speed and shooting accuracy.

SnowHard.Label: hard snow
SnowHard.Description: Snow reduces the accuracy of ranged weapons, extinguishes fire, and slows people down.

SnowGentle.Label: gentle snow
SnowGentle.Description: Snow reduces the accuracy of ranged weapons, extinguishes fire, and slows people down.

BloodRain.Label: blood rain
BloodRain.Description:
Anyone exposed to the blood rain for long enough will be driven into a berserk rage. Certain traits and psychic sensitivity influence the berserk effect.
(Anomaly)

ToxRain.Label: tox rain
ToxRain.Description:
Tox rain makes creatures sick with toxic buildup. It also reduces the accuracy of ranged weapons, extinguishes fire, and slows people down.
(Odyssey)

Sandstorm.Label: sandstorm
Sandstorm.Description:
Sandstorms reduce the accuracy of ranged weapons, slow people down, and get sand everywhere.
(Odyssey)

BlindFog.Label: blind fog
BlindFog.Description:
A heavy fog that reduces the accuracy of ranged weapons, as well as their maximum range.
(Odyssey)

Overcast.Label: overcast
Overcast.Description:
Thick clouds obscure the sky, reducing light levels.
(Odyssey)

Blizzard.Label: blizzard
Blizzard.Description:
Snow reduces the accuracy of ranged weapons, extinguishes fire, and slows people down.
(Odyssey)

TorrentialRain.Label: torrential rain
TorrentialRain.Description:
Torrential rain causes flooding. It also reduces the accuracy of ranged weapons, extinguishes fire, and slows people down.
(Odyssey)

VPE_Hurricane.Label: hurricane
VPE_Hurricane.Description:
Extreme wind will cause a slowdown to everyone not under the roof.
(Vanilla Psycasts Expanded)

VPE_RadioactiveFog.Label: radioactive fog
VPE_RadioactiveFog.Description:
A Nuclear reactor's meltdown has freed a cloud of radioactive material. This fog will hinder ranged attacks until it dissipates.
(Vanilla Furniture Expanded - Power)

Sinnamon_Windy.Label: whirlwind
Sinnamon_Windy.Description:
Wind is increasing the wind turbine output.
(More Ritual Rewards)

VPEH_Bloodstorm.Label: bloodstorm
VPEH_Bloodstorm.Description:
Mystical downpour of blood, caused by forbidden hemosage psycast. While non-hemogenic individuals are choking on blood, sanguophages regenerate hemogen and can cast psycasts without worrying about psychic heat.
(Vanilla Psycasts Expanded - Hemosage)

VEE_FertileRains.Label: fertile rain
VEE_FertileRains.Description:
Unusually nutrient-rich rainfall is sweeping across the region, boosting plant growth for its duration.
(Vanilla Landmarks Expanded)

VEE_DustStorm.Label: dust storm
VEE_DustStorm.Description:
A choking wall of wind-driven dust sweeps across the land, reducing visibility, slowing movement, and scouring anything left exposed.
(Vanilla Landmarks Expanded)
